properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 3:37AM EST until January 6 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 19 knots from the west
with gusts up to 32 knots. Gusts to 35 knots are possible. The
largest significant waves will be 3 feet with a potential
maximum wave height of 4 feet.

* WHERE...Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI and Port Sanilac to
Port Huron MI.

* WHEN...During the Small Craft Advisory, the maximum winds are
expected around 3 AM EST Monday with the largest waves
expected around 11 PM EST Sunday. During the Gale Watch, the
maximum winds are expected around 3 AM EST Monday with the
largest waves expected around 9 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST MONDAY
